title: How's The Josh? Watch The Indian Army Playing Garba In Most Coordinated & Disciplined Way Ever!
text:
How's The Josh? Watch The Indian Army Playing Garba In Most Coordinated & Disciplined Way Ever!

How's The Josh? Watch The Indian Army Playing Garba In Most Coordinated & Disciplined Way Ever!

Anand Mahindra is famous on Twitter for his quirky and interesting tweets. This time he's back with another interesting ‘festival tweet'! The business tycoon hosted a best ‘Dandiya Dad’ competition, as he wanted to brush up his own skills.

He asked his followers to post videos on Twitter and tag him, he also said that the best video will be awarded. A lot of people uploaded the videos and tagged him - some were quite hilarious.

But as a part of the competition, he received another video and he shared it on his Twitter account. The video shows soldiers of the Indian Army playing Garba while standing in two lines. The coordination between the men is just mind-blowing.

The tweet was captioned as ‘Haven't got any outstanding entries yet to my 'Dandiya Dad' competition but getting a tsunami of related videos. Here's one that gets my salute...No need to ask how the Josh is! Where is this from, Deepti?’

Haven’t got any outstanding entries yet to my ‘Dandiya Dad’ competition, but getting a tsunami of related videos. Here’s one that gets my salute...No need to ask how the Josh is! Where is this from, Deepti? https://t.co/qwFu76ZyIX — anand mahindra (@anandmahindra) October 6, 2019
